item.title: Roblox: Make a Boat Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Make a Boat is a Roblox game where you can show your creativity and have fun riding a ship over all kinds of jumps. You will create the ship entirely on your own, paying attention to its performance, strength, power, and, if you want, appearance.

However, good parts cost money, so at first your ship won't be able to sail even a mile. Fortunately, you can redeem Make a Boat codes and get some parts or cash.

All Make a Boat Codes

Working Make a Boat Codes

  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 3,000 Doubloons.
  • SAILING - Redeem this code to get x1 Average Motor.

Expired Make a Boat Codes

Currently, Make a Boat does not have any expired codes. All codes are currently working, and you can get rewards for them.

By redeeming Make a Boat codes, you can get rewards that will be useful for both beginners and experienced players. In just a couple of clicks, you can get some game currency or, for example, a brand new motor.

How to Redeem Codes in Make a Boat

Codes in Roblox games can be redeemed quickly and conveniently. In Make a Boat , you won't encounter any problems either. However, the “Codes” button in the game is so small that even experienced players can easily miss it. Therefore, to help you get your rewards, we have created a guide explaining how to activate codes in Make a Boat .

  • Launch Roblox and open Make a Boat .
  • Look at the upper-right corner of the screen. You need to click the blue button with a white check mark to open the code redemption window.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click the blue Redeem button.

Remember that codes can quickly expire, so redeem them as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Get More Make a Boat Codes

If you search thoroughly, you will likely find many more Roblox codes online, but it is a time-consuming process, and the codes may no longer be valid. To save time, we recommend bookmarking this guide in your browser so you don't lose it. We regularly add and update codes, so you can get the most rewards. If you're more interested in official sources of information, we recommend visiting the Make a Boat game's social media pages:

  • Make a Boat Roblox game page
  • Make a Boat Roblox group
  • Make a Boat Discord server

item.title: Battlefield 6 Dev Teases Bigger Maps
item.description:
Dice’s lead Battlefield producer, David Sirland, has teased that larger maps than the ones seen in the open beta will be available in Battlefield 6 . This is great news for Battlefield 6 fans who want more variety when playing the popular first-person shooter.

Battlefield 6 will be officially released on October 10, 2025, but fans already had a chance to try EA’s shooter during the recent open beta, which lasted from August 9 to 10, and will occur again between August 14 and 17. The first Battlefield 6 Open Beta weekend was a huge hit, becoming the “biggest ever,” according to EA. While no official numbers were shared, Battlefield 6 peaked at over 521,000 concurrent players on Steam.

Players Will be Able to See Bigger Maps in Battlefield 6 'Soon'

Something that a few players noticed, however, was that the maps available in the Open Beta were fairly small. So, when a gamer complained about it, Dice’s David Sirland answered that “speed is a factor of map size.” In addition, he said that Dice picked the maps available in the beta to give the “full-octane version” of Battlefield 6 to fans. However, large maps exist, and their tempo “scales accordingly.” Sirland also teased that gamers will get to see these maps “soon.”

Battlefield 6 has four maps available during the open beta: Iberian Offensive, Liberation Peak, Siege of Cairo, and Empire State, with the last one available only in the second weekend of the beta. Five other maps are planned for release: Operation Firestorm, Saints Quarter, New Sobek City, Mirak Valley, and Manhattan Bridge. With Mirak Valley reportedly being Battlefield 6 ’s biggest map, it’s possible that Sirland was referring to the official release when he said that big areas would be available soon.

While the open beta was a big hit, not everything is working entirely well in Battlefield 6 just yet. For instance, Battlefield 6 players had problems with its anti-cheat software, and had to uninstall Valorant to be able to play. This happened because the anti-cheat systems of both games require kernel-level access and interfere with each other.

Developers are also investigating an unexpectedly fast time-to-death bug in Battlefield 6 . The glitch was reported by hundreds of players, who shared videos of their characters being instantly knocked out without indications of being hit or taking damage seconds after being shot in the game. Hopefully, these issues will be corrected once Battlefield 6 is finally released, and gamers will have a smoother experience with both small and large maps in October.

item.title: 2 New Pokemon Squishmallows Plush Toys Revealed
item.description:
A new collaboration between Pokemon and Squishmallows are in the works, with Sprigatito and Rowlet next up to join the squashy plush collection. The Pokemon Squishmallows collabs have seen a lot of popularity, and these newest entries are likely to see a similar level of interest.

Pokemon fans have a lot to choose from when it comes to picking out a plushy based on their favorite pocket monsters. In addition to standard Pokemon plush toys, the Squishmallows and Build-a-Bear collabs have been wildly popular, with the plushes rapidly selling out. Fans of Grass-type Pokemon starters likely won't want to miss this new opportunity.

Newest Pokemon Squishmallows Join the Growing Line-up

Jazwares has shared a new video revealing the next pocket monsters coming to the Squishmallows Pokemon collaboration line. A brief video shows off Sprigatito, the Grass-type starter from Pokemon Scarlet and Violet , as well as Rowlet, the Grass/Flying-type starter from Pokemon Sun and Moon , as well as Pokemon Legends: Arceus . So far, the companies have only shared static images of the plushes from the front, but fans can get a general idea of what they look like from the new video.

While much about the new releases haven't been stated outright, there are some elements fans can likely expect from these new plush toys. Pokemon Squishmallows have been made in varying sizes, which impacts their price. Most Pokemon Squishmallows have sold for anywhere from $19.99 to around $50 for the jumbo variety. Additionally, Pokemon Squishmallows tend to be sold in more than one store, but with some differences. Notably, the Pokemon Center releases generally include a special Poke Ball logo embroidered on the back of the plush denoting them as being from that retailer. The releases that are available from general stores like Target lack this detail, but are otherwise identical. With this official teaser now released, fans likely won't have to wait long to learn more about the new Pokemon Squishmallows and when they can expect to purchase them.

So far, fans seem to be receptive to the new designs, with many joking that Rowlet hasn't changed at all from its original appearance. Those who want a squishy Pokemon plush of their own but aren't necessarily interested in Rowlet or Sprigatito have plenty of other options available to them. The line got its start in 2022 with Pikachu and Gengar Squishmallows, and has since expanded to include numerous favorites, including Eevee, Chansey, Dragonite, Clefairy, Piplup, and Pikachu variants, among others. Many of these are in-stock direct from retailers now, including Target, Walmart, and GameStop stores.

item.title: Next Minecraft Live Date Seemingly Revealed
item.description:
The next Minecraft Live broadcast could take place as early as September 22, according to sources that stated Mojang accidentally revealed the date via a website error. Although the Minecraft development team has not officially confirmed when the next Minecraft Live stream will be, the supposed September 22 date would mark six months since the previous live event.

On March 22, the previous episode of Minecraft Live offered fans an extended glimpse into A Minecraft Movie before its April 4 launch in US theaters. Along with the extended movie trailer, Minecraft Live also revealed new features that were added to the game throughout the spring and summer through multiple updates. Some of the features that were revealed during Minecraft Live's spring episode included the Happy Ghast mount, a friendly Ghastling creature that can be found around the Soulsand Valley biome in the Nether, and the Vibrant Visuals shaders as part of a Bedrock Edition update that launched on the same day.

The Next Minecraft Live Episode Could Air on September 22

While the March episode of Minecraft Live had plenty of content for fans to consume, the date of the next stream may have been revealed by accident. As spotted by Insider Gaming, Mojang’s Spanish site stated that the next Minecraft Live stream would air on Monday, September 22, at 1:00 PM Eastern. The leaked date appeared in the FAQ section of Minecraft 's official Spanish website, but is completely absent from the English version. If proven true, it would mark six months to the day since the previous Minecraft Live episode, and would line up with when some of Minecraft' s planned content for the fall could go live. As of this writing, Mojang has not officially announced when the next Minecraft Live episode will air, so fans must take the rumored date with a fine grain of salt.

As for what could be shown off during the next Minecraft Live broadcast, the Fall Drop and its focus on all things copper could be the key point of the stream. Additional features planned for the rest of 2025 and into 2026 could also make appearances, should the Minecraft Live episode be confirmed. The surprise third drop of 2025 was announced by Mojang on July 1, and some of its content is now available for testing on the Bedrock Edition beta and Java Edition snapshot builds. Players can opt into testing these experimental features from the Minecraft launcher on PC by selecting the preview tab and following the instructions to install any related files onto their machines.

While Minecraft players have plenty of items to test ahead of the Fall Drop content update, Mojang could save some surprises for Minecraft Live viewers to enjoy. Only time will tell when the next episode of Minecraft Live will be officially revealed.

Minecraft is a game made up of blocks, creatures, and community. You can survive the night or build a work of art – the choice is all yours. But if the thought of exploring a vast new world all on your own feels overwhelming, then fear not!

Minecraft has no set goal and can be played however you’d like! This is why it’s sometimes called a “sandbox game” – there are lots of things for you to do, and lots of ways that you can play. If you like being creative, then you can use the blocks to build things from your imagination. If you’re feeling brave, you can explore the world and face daring challenges. Blocks can be broken, crafted, placed to reshape the landscape, or used to build fantastical creations.

Creatures can be battled or befriended, depending on how you play. The world of Minecraft allows for epic adventures, quiet meditations, and everything in between. You can even share your creations with other players, or play in community worlds!

item.title: Madden NFL 26 Ultimate Team Coin Farming Guide
item.description:
Ultimate Team is back again in Madden NFL 26 , and there are a ton of ways to earn Coins so you can buy packs without spending any real money. Since everyone starts from scratch in Madden 26 Ultimate Team, these Coin farming methods will give you a huge headstart over the competition.

Coins are the main free currency in Madden NFL 26 , and they can be used to purchase mostly everything in the Ultimate Team shop. Some special offers are exclusively available with paid currency, but the majority of packs for sale can be purchased with either type of currency. Challenges and packs change all the time in Madden NFL 26 , but these are the best ways to earn Coins so you can get more Ultimate Team players.

Farm Challenges for Coins

The number one way to earn Coins in Madden 26 Ultimate Team is completing challenges . It's simple, but you'll be surprised at how many Coins you can earn just by playing the game. New challenges cycle in all the time, so there are always new ways to earn currency.

The challenge rewards are fine on their own, but it's really the Field Pass XP rewards that you want. The Madden NFL 26 Field Pass not only has a ton of Coins and other bonuses for you to earn, but it also has a bunch of valuable packs. You may not want some of the players you get from Field Pass packs, but you can sell them to other players who do need them for huge payouts.

Check the Auction House

Speaking of selling players, the Auction House is the best way to make money in Madden NFL 26 Ultimate Team. Pulling a specific player can make you a millionaire instantly, but don't neglect the Auction House for boring mid-tier players , either.

Someone is always on the lookout for something, even if it may not be that exciting to you, and that's the key to making money in Ultimate Team. Even if a player has a high quicksell value, always check the Auction House listings to see if you can squeeze some Coins out of that card.

Open Valuable Packs

If you want to make money in Ultimate Team, you need to open the right packs . Don't open packs that contain players you need. Instead, focus on packs containing players with the highest Auction House values so you can earn some Coins and potentially make a profit off your pack opening.

The Pregame Access packs are filled with high-rated players if you have the Deluxe Edition of Madden NFL 26 , and the daily packs are a surprisingly strong source of Coins in the long run. If you're willing to spend some Madden Points, then the bundles like the 12x Player Beginner Pack will return a ton of Coins if you don't need those players.

New packs come and go all the time in Madden NFL 26 , so follow the meta and keep an eye on the Auction House to see which cards are selling for the most Coins. As long as you invest your Coins wisely and open the right packs, you'll turn a profit most of the time, so you can continue the cycle once more. Eventually, you'll end up with an incredibly high-rated Ultimate Team.
